name: Debt Over It!
description:
“GET OUT OF MY HOUSE!” 

Suddenly, you and your bags have been thrown outside your mom’s basement…. 

Now that you’ve been kicked out…. 

Welcome to the WONDROUS world of debt! 

You are now responsible for surviving financially on your own, from last month’s overdue rent, to the $20 that sneaky pickpocketer had snuck from your bag while you were at that job interview, to your distant relatives begging for your inheritance money… you’re on your own!
